name.pehl.gwt.piriti.client.converter
Class LongConverter

java.lang.Object
  name.pehl.gwt.piriti.client.converter.AbstractConverter<Long>
      name.pehl.gwt.piriti.client.converter.LongConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter<Long>
public class LongConverter
extends AbstractConverter<Long>

Converter for long objects. Uses Long.valueOf(value) if no format is specified and NumberFormat.parse(String) otherwise.

Version:
$LastChangedRevision: 7 $
Author:
$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $

Method Detail

convert

public Long convert(String value,
                    String format)
Converts the specified value to long.

Parameters:
value - The string to be converted
format - Must be a valid number format or null
Returns:
null if the value is null, empty or in the wrong format, otherwise the converted long
See Also:
Converter.convert(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

Parsing happens in an extra method so it can be overwritten in unit tests.

format -
